fuseg.name: FUSeg 2021 - Foot Ulcer Segmentation Challenge
fuseg.description: 1,210 foot ulcer images with segmentation masks from 889 patients

azh_segmentation.name: AZH Wound Segmentation Dataset
azh_segmentation.description: 1,109 foot ulcer images with segmentation masks

azh_classification.name: AZH Wound Classification Dataset
azh_classification.description: 730 wound images classified into 4 types: diabetic, pressure, surgical, venous

azh_localization.name: AZH Wound Localization Dataset
azh_localization.description: 1,010 wound images with bounding boxes and body location labels

wound_tissue.name: WoundTissue Dataset
wound_tissue.description: 147 wound images with 6-class tissue segmentation (granulation, necrosis, slough, maceration, tendon, bone)

medetec.name: Medetec Wound Database
medetec.description: ~592 images of various wound types (diabetic, pressure, venous ulcers)
medetec.instructions:
MANUAL DOWNLOAD REQUIRED:
1. Visit: http://www.medetec.co.uk/files/medetec-image-databases.html
2. Download the wound image categories you need
3. Extract to: data/raw/medetec/

kaggle_dfu.name: Kaggle DFU Dataset
kaggle_dfu.instructions:
KAGGLE DOWNLOAD:
1. Install Kaggle CLI: pip install kaggle
2. Setup API: Place kaggle.json in ~/.kaggle/
3. Run: kaggle datasets download -d laithjj/diabetic-foot-ulcer-dfu
4. Or use this script with --dataset kaggle_dfu

chronic_wound_db.name: Chronic Wound Database (Poland)
chronic_wound_db.instructions:
MANUAL DOWNLOAD REQUIRED:
1. Visit: https://chronicwounddatabase.eu/
2. Register for access
3. Download the dataset
4. Extract to: data/raw/chronic_wound_db/

dfuc.name: DFUC 2020/2022/2024 Datasets
dfuc.description: Official MICCAI challenge datasets (4,000+ images each)
dfuc.instructions:
LICENSE AGREEMENT REQUIRED:
1. Visit: https://dfu-challenge.github.io/
2. Click "Apply for Datasets": http://www2.docm.mmu.ac.uk/STAFF/M.Yap/dataset.php
3. Fill out the license agreement form
4. You will receive download links via email (usually within 1-2 business days)
5. Extract to: data/raw/dfuc/

This is the HIGHEST QUALITY dataset available - highly recommended!
